metadata.name: Bad EGG
metadata.description:
[h1]Glitch Reroll! [/h1] Introducing the Bad EGG!!! Visit your local [HIDDEN & CURSED] room to find this item! Use it on your favorite pedestal it will turn into a glitch item, just like your best friend TMTRAINER would. Experience 6̴͉̕4̶̂ͅ3̴̯̂0̸̯͘4̵̢̋6̷̞͝0̵̻̑4̷̬̍ combinations of effects, and let the chaos unfold!
Every time you use the EGG, the charge time will change. Something special happens if you use the red EGG. Some say it [ERROR! INVALID CHECKSUM] [spoiler]It spawns ???.[/spoiler]
Comes with External Item Descriptions and Encyclopedia support.
